title: 9 reports because people....just...people man......i was the victim and everyone was against me
body: game lobby opens, i call support. i go kat....game starts, brand is apparently supporting, and im shoved out of lane and we have no jungler, i go mid....yasuo: OMG, TROLL, GET OUT OF LANE, TROLL TROLL...i go top, get killed by riven....whole team: TROLL TROLL TROLL............all game....and now im sitting with what i can assume is 9 reports

replies.body: So, you're saying you didn't do anything wrong that would earn honest reports?
He's saying he called support, picked his champion, someone else forced him out of the role, so he went elsewhere.. no wonder the system is messed up.
I'm saying there is more to this story. It's up to the OP if they want to disclose that.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KvAxPHdZ,comment-id=000600010000,timestamp=2016-03-09T22:41:37.732+0000)
>
> I'm saying there is more to this story. It's up to the OP if they want to disclose that.

NO. 

PLEASE TANTRAM, give us the oishii of the {{summoner:11}} 

Onegai Rioto-sama... you guys {{summoner:11}}ing people that claim to be innocent is the best part of this forum.
Please bring it on, I love reading the chat of people like OP, who claim innocence.  When lyte was on a killing spree it was phenomenal.
Why even asking? Your system would punish him anyway even if he was doing ntohing wrong

> [{quoted}](name=Malliodd,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KvAxPHdZ,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-03-09T22:19:42.885+0000)
>
> Why even asking? Your system would punish him anyway even if he was doing ntohing wrong

That's 100% wrong.

I get reported in roughly 2 out of 3 matches and yet I am never punished.
Lol I have seen people punished for informing that the other team that a player is trolling when the other team asks, not raging or blaming or anything else just informing them.

^ so true, the forums are full of people getting removed who get angry at being trolled while the trolls still continue. I'm about to leave this game myself I have had over 200 games trolled and 120 games with afks  just this season alone, most of those players on my block list are still playing so yea what's the point of playing this game anymore when almost every game is becoming this.

If the reports were false, they won't do anything. Don't give them reason to be legitimate reports and you'll be fine. Mass reporting also doesn't hurt you any more than a single report does; punishment is calculated per match, not per report. Reports just flag your match to be checked, and more reports can't make the system check it any harder.

Just to throw in my 2 cents here: It's right that reporting you for picking whatever champ in whatever role is no legit reason to report and thus you don't have to worry about.

But you obviously have played it a few more times, than just once. And the results just look bad. Like... real bad. I understand your point of playing whichever champ you want, but there are certain roles that just let them make work better. Supports want either heavy cc and tank stats, or plain range and poke power. Kat has none of these, thus making her not the best pick for support.. I really don't mind creativity in this game, I carried as Support Jayce a long time ago, and I had an astonishing Support J4 in my latest game, who caused havoc all above the opponent. But you should really consider working within the border of a Champions pool of capabilities, rather than spinning a wheel and see what happens. People out there might (obviously) have problems with picks that are THAT much off their usual playground..

And to be honest, ever since TeamBuilder died, I use my Normals for some real stupid stuff as well every once in a while. As long as you don't do these things in Ranked, nobody gets hurt and everything is k.

I take it this was blind pick?  If it wasn't blind pick it doesn't really matter what you called, as roles are assigned.

As for their behavior just mute them.  As far as the punishment system is concerned there is only one game where you were reported.  The number of reports per game, from what I've seen at least, doesn't seem to matter.  You would need a few more games where you are reported to even show up on the system's radar, and even then it likely would see that the reports are false.

If you ever do get wrongly punished just come on the boards here, go to the Help & Support section, and under Guidelines on the left hand side click on "submit a ticket".  It's not in a great spot, but it's a highlighted link under Culture.  Just fill out the ticket as best you can, fill in anything that doesn't really apply with the closest answer available, and things should be handled for you.  Just be sure to have some patience.
yea, blind pick
You admit you trolled... but are coming here because.... ?
what? how did i admit i trolled?
It's not even close to reportable.

Go read the rules buddy.  Choice of champion is not a reportable offense.  He could pick the literal worse thing in the world, but so long as he is actually trying it's not punishable.

It's not a matter of opinion.  It's simply the rules.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Maybe the dude was harsh.

But yeah, if you act like that is honestly cringe as hell.

I could even get that as passive aggressive and get pissed on it.

You can report someone for whatever reason you like, but it will be a false report and will not lead to a punishment.

Saying something is reportable, however, means it is also punishable.  Playing a non-meta support, even playing that support poorly, is not punishable.

actually you are wrong, if the system is one that learns and adapts to how the community thinks (like riot claims) a overwhelming  shift in the way people report would cause the system to change how it views certain behavior. 

The first step in changing the system is reporting what you find as punishable. IF enough players agree the system will conform.

The system does not adapt on it's own.  Riot is the one that adapts the system.  The system gathers the data and Riot adapts it to that data.

Even if they have made a system that can adapt on it's own they will never allow it to do things that go against their own rules for what is and is not punishable, like punishing someone for being bad or picking a champion in a role they were not meant for.  There's simply no way they would let a system capable of learning trends like that make it's own decisions over what is punishable.

They are not exactly unfamiliar with their own community, after all.
its.........not...................lol wat? how is playing a champion breaking a rule? no...im not doing this.....you are definatly trolling me and im not getting into this argument.

because sometimes i lose.......i'm not a chanllenger and im not fabbbyyy....im an unranked (technicly bronze) player and i like to play around in normals doing things i havent before.....this week im liking alistar and kat support...i was doing some kogmaw jungle...next week i might get back on a singed or veigar adc kick....................who knows..........this is a video game...there are winners and there are losers
no, i played against him the other week....he played around with naut top, built the portal and banner of command and freaking wrecked us
i understood it.....it was top notch material...well done....you must be proud. but if you must know. fabbbyyy is a world professional player
And there are people who pray to the Rito gods that they don't get paired up with "supports" like you.  kat support.  please.  she brings nothing supportive to the table.

> [{quoted}](name=BADxW0LF,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KvAxPHdZ,comment-id=0001000000010001000000010001,timestamp=2016-03-10T03:39:57.291+0000)

She holds aggro pretty well, like ppl automatically focus her on reflex when she uses ult - even if she builds full tank @_@.

...no heals, no cc, no buffs...just straight up damage.  not conducive for a support role.  If you want to do that with a premade 5s groups...go ahead.  But don't put a bunch of randoms through that hell.

What the dude means is that Katarina has a global aoe taunt on her, especially when she ults.

Obviously is nothing coded into the game, and it is only a joke.

> [{quoted}](name=Halywarrior,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KvAxPHdZ,comment-id=000100000001000100000001,timestamp=2016-03-09T20:52:14.583+0000)

9 reports tells me you are the losers :^)
Why not?  It's not that hard to understand.

Dude... Ive played support skarner, Support jarvan, Support trundle(before it was a thing.), support ziggs, top braum, top AP aatrox, mained jungle tryn, and now I main AP mid Sion.

I could keep going on and on with this list, but to just sum it up, been playing off meta in ranked for 6 years, never been banned. Never been suspended, Never even had a warning. And dude Im not toxic, but Im also far from perfect in chat, I get frustrated, and short with people all the time. 

So from my experience, it's NEVER just about what champ you pick, and where you go with them that results in a ban. Ive played top kogmaw, WITH A RIOTER IN GAME!!! So yeah man..

Sorry for the rant, but people like OP drive me nuts. You can play how you want if you play to win, and act decent.

Ill usually get at least one dude a week hardcore rages at me for a pick I choose, and then trolls, and ruins the whole game. Guess who gets all the reports.. Not me. :-D

Also last little tidbit on this subject, I do get reported, or at least they say they'll report me, and I tell them to go ahead, and I don't even worry about it, because Im THAT CONFIDENT, that as long as I honor the summoners code, I'm good to go.

False reports do nothing.

Just remember that if they're not false, you will eventually be punished.
Been in this situation. Depends on how you reacted though, so can't offer help without chat logs :/

that sucks

i went kat support twice, in the game i won, i was against a braum who was afraid of me that he ran away instead of fighting, so we were able to win lane then game... 

it didnt work for me in the second game, so i never did that again

other game (blind pick) i thought i was mid, so i got talon, when game started i realized i was support...it was a bad game

note to self: dont pick assassins as support, go play river or duo jungle, but do not go as support
